00028 import Paths
00029 import os
00030 
00031 ## @brief Initializes gettext translation system.
00032 def initializeTranslations(language=None):
00033         import locale
00034         import gettext
00035 
00036         name = 'koo'
00037         try:
00038                 locale.setlocale(locale.LC_ALL, '')
00039         except:
00040                 # If locale is not supported just continue
00041                 # with default language
00042                 print "Warning: Unsupported locale." 
00043 
00044         if not language:
00045                 language, encoding = locale.getdefaultlocale()
00046                 if not language:
00047                         language = 'C'
00048 
00049         # Set environment variables otherwise it doesn't properly
00050         # work on windows
00051         os.environ.setdefault('LANG', language)
00052         os.environ.setdefault('LANGUAGE', language)
00053 
00054         # First of all search the files in the l10n directory (in case Koo was
00055         # not installed in the system).
00056         directory = Paths.searchFile( 'l10n' )
00057         if directory:
00058                 try:
00059                         lang = gettext.translation(name, directory, fallback=False)
00060                 except:
00061                         directory = None
00062 
00063         if not directory:
00064                 # If the first try didn't work try to search translation files
00065                 # in standard directories 'share/locale'
00066                 directory = Paths.searchFile( os.path.join('share','locale') )
00067                 lang = gettext.translation(name, directory, fallback=True)
00068 
00069         lang.install(unicode=1)
00070 
00071 ## @brief Initializes Qt translation system.
00072 def initializeQtTranslations(language=None):
00073         from PyQt4.QtCore import QTranslator, QCoreApplication, QLocale
00074         if not language:
00075                 language = str(QLocale.system().name())
00076 
00077         # First we try to load the file with the same system language name 
00078         # Usually in $LANG and looks something like ca_ES, de_DE, etc.
00079         file = Paths.searchFile( '%s.qm' % language, 'l10n' )
00080         if not file:
00081                 # If the first step didn't work try to remove country
00082                 # information and try again.
00083                 language = language.split('_')[0]
00084                 file = Paths.searchFile( '%s.qm' % language, 'l10n' )
00085 
00086         # If no translation files were found, don't crash
00087         # but continue silently.
00088         if file:
00089                 translator = QTranslator( QCoreApplication.instance() )
00090                 translator.load( file )
00091                 QCoreApplication.instance().installTranslator( translator )
00092 
00093         # First we try to load the file with the same system language name 
00094         # Usually in $LANG and looks something like ca_ES, de_DE, etc.
00095         file = Paths.searchFile( 'qt_%s.qm' % language, 'l10n' )
00096         if not file:
00097                 # If the first step didn't work try to remove country
00098                 # information and try again.
00099                 language = language.split('_')[0]
00100                 file = Paths.searchFile( 'qt_%s.qm' % language, 'l10n' )
00101         # If no translation files were found, don't crash
00102         # but continue silently.
00103         if file:
00104                 translator = QTranslator( QCoreApplication.instance() )
00105                 translator.load( file )
00106                 QCoreApplication.instance().installTranslator( translator )
